author: MSNBC
title: First drought, now war: Global wheat supplies in peril
description: Russia’s war in Ukraine — between two top wheat producers and in a region known as Europe’s breadbasket — has sent wheat prices soaring.
content:
The pandemic already had food prices rising.
Now, Russias war in Ukraine between two top wheat producers and in a region known as Europes breadbasket has sent wheat prices soaring, raising the risk … [+2913 chars]
